column5: Got up to Jiggy last weekend for the first time all summer alone with Monique.. it was pretty nice.  It was pretty chilly but we managed to get out for some fishing and hunting.  Caught some nice fish and a few birds. We have a great year class of pike on the river after all these years of catch and release.  We cant go out without catching one or two pike over 32 inches!! - well..  she can got out without catching one or two pike over 32 inches!!                          Averys back next week and then its a week of fishing and bird hunting again before we close up camp, and the long wait till Maple syrup begins!!
You are one lucky man to have a wife who can smile while in a boat with the snow drifting by!!
Hold that out as far as you want Bud and it won't be as big as any of Monique's!
Hold that out as far as you want Bud and it won't be as big as any of Monique's!  A  mans gotta try  lol
Those pics are classic, especially the one of Musky kissing Monique
Awesome!  No moose hunt this year TJ?
The place looks good bud, you've come a long ways from days you started jiggy with the tent.

You are one lucky man to have a wife who can smile while in a boat with the snow drifting by!!  Shes a trooper!!  Those pics are classic, especially the one of Musky kissing Monique  Hes a licker... lol.. but hes getting old..  hard to believe hes 15.  He gets a ride into camp now on the back of the bike.  Awesome! No moose hunt this year TJ?  Nope, not this year.  Looks chilly but fun!  We didnt get up much this year so were trying to get as much in as possible.  The place looks good bud, you've come a long ways from days you started jiggy with the tent.  Its funny Lew,  theres days I miss the tent, Monique too.....
Awesome man, i love those dark water colours on the fish. Looks like fun!
That's great T.J.  How do the bird numbers look to you this year?
About time you two um three got a little rest.   Art
That's great T.J.  How do the bird numbers look to you this year?   Id have to say average, which up there is good,  we only went out for a couple hours... saw 8, got three.
